Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Sunteam is our organization's name. We can prepare data and make it stored in filecoin network.
Digital Earth Africaâ€™s Monthly NDVI Anomaly service provides estimate of vegetation condition. The NDVI anomaly service is effective for understanding the extent, intensity and impact of a drought.
This dataset contains various types of digital data relating to earthquakes in central and northern California. Time series data come from broadband, short period, and strong motion seismic sensors, GPS, and other geophysical sensors.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Monthly Normalised Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) Anomaly
Seismic waveform data (miniSEED format), metadata (FDSNStationXML format) and earthquake catalog (CSV & Hypoinverse formats)
